Title: The Paradise of Shaddad Palace Discovered by Alexander the Great
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.606 depicts the paradise of Shaddad Palace discovered by Alexander the Great.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Muhammad Musá al-Mudhahhib
